00032 #ifndef __DNA_MESHDATA_TYPES_H__

00038 struct Bone;
00039 struct Image;

00041 /*tessellation face, see MLoop/MPoly for the real face data*/
00042 typedef struct MFace {
00043     unsigned int v1, v2, v3, v4;
00044     short mat_nr;
00045     char edcode, flag;  /* we keep edcode, for conversion to edges draw flags in old files */
00046 } MFace;
00047 
00048 typedef struct MEdge {
00049     unsigned int v1, v2;
00050     char crease, bweight;
00051     short flag;
00052 } MEdge;
00053 
00054 typedef struct MDeformWeight {
00055     int             def_nr;
00056     float           weight;
00057 } MDeformWeight;
00058 
00059 typedef struct MDeformVert {
00060     struct MDeformWeight *dw;
00061     int totweight;
00062     int flag;   /* flag only in use for weightpaint now */
00063 } MDeformVert;
00064 
00065 typedef struct MVert {
00066     float   co[3];
00067     short   no[3];
00068     char flag, bweight;
00069 } MVert;
00070 
00071 /* tessellation vertex color data.
00072  * at the moment alpha is abused for vertex painting
00073  * and not used for transparency, note that red and blue are swapped */
00074 typedef struct MCol {
00075     char a, r, g, b;    
00076 } MCol;
00077 
00078 /* new face structure, replaces MFace, which is now
00079  * only used for storing tessellations.*/
00080 typedef struct MPoly {
00081     /* offset into loop array and number of loops in the face */
00082     int loopstart;
00083     int totloop; /* keep signed since we need to subtract when getting the previous loop */
00084     short mat_nr;
00085     char flag, pad;
00086 } MPoly;
00087 
00088 /* the e here is because we want to move away from
00089  * relying on edge hashes.*/
00090 typedef struct MLoop {
00091     unsigned int v; /*vertex index*/
00092     unsigned int e; /*edge index*/
00093 } MLoop;
00094 
00095 typedef struct MTexPoly {
00096     struct Image *tpage;
00097     char flag, transp;
00098     short mode,tile,unwrap;
00099 } MTexPoly;
00100 
00101 /* can copy from/to MTexPoly/MTFace */
00102 #define ME_MTEXFACE_CPY(dst, src)   \
00103 {                                   \
00104     (dst)->tpage  = (src)->tpage;   \
00105     (dst)->flag   = (src)->flag;    \
00106     (dst)->transp = (src)->transp;  \
00107     (dst)->mode   = (src)->mode;    \
00108     (dst)->tile   = (src)->tile;    \
00109     (dst)->unwrap = (src)->unwrap;  \
00110 }
00111 
00112 typedef struct MLoopUV {
00113     float uv[2];
00114     int flag;
00115 } MLoopUV;
00116 
00117 /*mloopuv->flag*/
00118 #define MLOOPUV_EDGESEL 1
00119 #define MLOOPUV_VERTSEL 2
00120 #define MLOOPUV_PINNED  4
00121 
00122 /* at the moment alpha is abused for vertex painting
00123  * and not used for transparency, note that red and blue are swapped */
00124 typedef struct MLoopCol {
00125     char r, g, b, a;
00126 } MLoopCol;
00127 
00128 #define MESH_MLOOPCOL_FROM_MCOL(_mloopcol, _mcol) \
00129 {                                                 \
00130     MLoopCol   *mloopcol__tmp = _mloopcol;        \
00131     const MCol *mcol__tmp     = _mcol;            \
00132     mloopcol__tmp->r = mcol__tmp->b;              \
00133     mloopcol__tmp->g = mcol__tmp->g;              \
00134     mloopcol__tmp->b = mcol__tmp->r;              \
00135     mloopcol__tmp->a = mcol__tmp->a;              \
00136 } (void)0
00137 
00138 
00139 #define MESH_MLOOPCOL_TO_MCOL(_mloopcol, _mcol) \
00140 {                                               \
00141     const MLoopCol *mloopcol__tmp = _mloopcol;  \
00142     MCol           *mcol__tmp     = _mcol;      \
00143     mcol__tmp->b = mloopcol__tmp->r;            \
00144     mcol__tmp->g = mloopcol__tmp->g;            \
00145     mcol__tmp->r = mloopcol__tmp->b;            \
00146     mcol__tmp->a = mloopcol__tmp->a;            \
00147 } (void)0

00150     float co[2];

00161     struct Image *tpage;

00163     short mode, tile, unwrap;

00185 typedef struct MDisps {
00186     /* Strange bug in SDNA: if disps pointer comes first, it fails to see totdisp */
00187     int totdisp;
00188     int level;
00189     float (*disps)[3];
00190     
00191     /* Used for hiding parts of a multires mesh. Essentially the multires
00192        equivalent of MVert.flag's ME_HIDE bit.
00193     
00194        This is a bitmap, keep in sync with type used in BLI_bitmap.h */
00195     unsigned int *hidden;
00196 } MDisps;
00197 
00199 typedef struct MultiresCol {
00200     float a, r, g, b;
00201 } MultiresCol;
00202 typedef struct MultiresColFace {
00203     /* vertex colors */
00204     MultiresCol col[4];
00205 } MultiresColFace;
00206 typedef struct MultiresFace {
00207     unsigned int v[4];
00208     unsigned int mid;
00209     char flag, mat_nr, pad[2];
00210 } MultiresFace;
00211 typedef struct MultiresEdge {
00212     unsigned int v[2];
00213     unsigned int mid;
00214 } MultiresEdge;
00215 
00216 struct MultiresMapNode;
00217 typedef struct MultiresLevel {
00218     struct MultiresLevel *next, *prev;
00219 
00220     MultiresFace *faces;
00221     MultiresColFace *colfaces;
00222     MultiresEdge *edges;
00223 
00224     unsigned int totvert, totface, totedge, pad;
00225 
00226     /* Kept for compatibility with even older files */
00227     MVert *verts;
00228 } MultiresLevel;
00229 
00230 typedef struct Multires {
00231     ListBase levels;
00232     MVert *verts;
00233 
00234     unsigned char level_count, current, newlvl, edgelvl, pinlvl, renderlvl;
00235     unsigned char use_col, flag;
00236 
00237     /* Special level 1 data that cannot be modified from other levels */
00238     CustomData vdata;
00239     CustomData fdata;
00240     short *edge_flags;
00241     char *edge_creases;
00242 } Multires;

00246 typedef struct MRecast {
00247     int     i;
00248 } MRecast;

00250 /* mvert->flag (1=SELECT) */
00251 #define ME_SPHERETEST       2
00252 #define ME_VERT_TMP_TAG     4
00253 #define ME_HIDE             16
00254 #define ME_VERT_MERGED      (1<<6)
00255 #define ME_VERT_PBVH_UPDATE (1<<7)
00256 
00257 /* medge->flag (1=SELECT)*/
00258 #define ME_EDGEDRAW         (1<<1)
00259 #define ME_SEAM             (1<<2)
00260 #define ME_FGON             (1<<3) /* no longer used (now we have ngons), only defined so we can clear it */
00261                         /* reserve 16 for ME_HIDE */
00262 #define ME_EDGERENDER       (1<<5)
00263 #define ME_LOOSEEDGE        (1<<7)
00264 /* #define ME_SEAM_LAST     (1<<8) */ /* UNUSED */
00265 #define ME_SHARP            (1<<9)    /* only reason this flag remains a 'short' */
00266 
00267 /* puno = vertexnormal (mface) */
00268 #define ME_PROJXY       16
00269 #define ME_PROJXZ       32
00270 #define ME_PROJYZ       64
00271 
00272 /* edcode (mface) */
00273 #define ME_V1V2         1
00274 #define ME_V2V3         2
00275 #define ME_V3V1         4
00276 #define ME_V3V4         4
00277 #define ME_V4V1         8
00278 
00279 /* flag (mface) */
00280 #define ME_SMOOTH           1
00281 #define ME_FACE_SEL         2
00282 /* flag ME_HIDE==16 is used here too */ 
00283 
00284 #define ME_POLY_LOOP_PREV(mloop, mp, i)  (&(mloop)[(mp)->loopstart + (((i) + (mp)->totloop - 1) % (mp)->totloop)])
00285 #define ME_POLY_LOOP_NEXT(mloop, mp, i)  (&(mloop)[(mp)->loopstart + (((i) + 1) % (mp)->totloop)])
00286 
00287 /* mselect->type */
00288 #define ME_VSEL 0
00289 #define ME_ESEL 1
00290 #define ME_FSEL 2
00291 
00292 /* mtface->flag */
00293 #define TF_SELECT   1 /* use MFace hide flag (after 2.43), should be able to reuse after 2.44 */
00294 #define TF_ACTIVE   2 /* deprecated! */
00295 #define TF_SEL1     4
00296 #define TF_SEL2     8
00297 #define TF_SEL3     16
00298 #define TF_SEL4     32
00299 #define TF_HIDE     64 /* unused, same as TF_SELECT */
00300 
00301 /* mtface->mode */
00302 #define TF_DYNAMIC      1
00303 #define TF_ALPHASORT    2
00304 #define TF_TEX          4
00305 #define TF_SHAREDVERT   8
00306 #define TF_LIGHT        16
00307 
00308 #define TF_CONVERTED 32 /* tface converted to material */
00309 
00310 #define TF_SHAREDCOL    64
00311 #define TF_TILES        128     /* deprecated */
00312 #define TF_BILLBOARD    256
00313 #define TF_TWOSIDE      512
00314 #define TF_INVISIBLE    1024
00315 
00316 #define TF_OBCOL        2048
00317 #define TF_BILLBOARD2   4096    /* with Z axis constraint */
00318 #define TF_SHADOW       8192
00319 #define TF_BMFONT       16384
00320 
00321 /* mtface->transp, values 1-4 are used as flags in the GL, WARNING, TF_SUB cant work with this */
00322 #define TF_SOLID    0
00323 #define TF_ADD      1
00324 #define TF_ALPHA    2
00325 #define TF_CLIP     4 /* clipmap alpha/binary alpha all or nothing! */
00326 
00327 /* sub is not available in the user interface anymore */
00328 #define TF_SUB      3
00329 
00330 
00331 /* mtface->unwrap */
00332 #define TF_DEPRECATED1  1
00333 #define TF_DEPRECATED2  2
00334 #define TF_DEPRECATED3  4
00335 #define TF_DEPRECATED4  8
00336 #define TF_PIN1         16
00337 #define TF_PIN2         32
00338 #define TF_PIN3         64
00339 #define TF_PIN4         128
